name: Clin N
title: Clinical N
notes:
**Note 1:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in metastasis.

**Note 2:**  Superior and inferior mesenteric nodes are coded in distant metastasis.  Mesenteric nodes, NOS are coded in regional lymph nodes.

**Note 3:**  Assign N1 if regional lymph nodes are involved but there is no indication of the number of nodes involved.

**Regional lymph nodes for appendix:**

    Celiac
        Anterior (prececal)
        Ileocolic
        Posterior (retrocecal)
        Right colic
    Colic, NOS
    Epicolic (adjacent to bowel wall)
    Mesenteric, NOS
    Mesocolic, NOS
    Paracolic/pericolic

    Regional lymph nodes, NOS
    Lymph nodes, NOS
rows: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed

Unknown; regional lymph nodes not stated
Not documented in patient record
